mapper.select: SELECT R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_TYPE, R.ROOM_PRICE, R.CAPACITY, R.STATUS FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN ROOM_RESERV RP ON R.ROOM_NO = RP.ROOM_NO AND RP.PAY_STATUS = 'Y' AND ( TO_DATE(#{checkInDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(RP.CHECK_OUT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{checkOutDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_DATE(RP.CHECK_IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) WHERE R.ROOM_TYPE = '스탠다드' ORDER BY R.ROOM_NO ASC
